description: Quality-Assurance-As-A-Service (QAaaS) multi-agent system configuration for Coral Protocol

repoClonerAgent.description: Clones repositories from GitHub/GitLab for testing pipeline

unitTestAgent.description: Runs unit tests on cloned repositories

integrationAgent.description: Handles integration testing between different services and modules

securityAgent.description: Performs security scanning using tools like OWASP/ZAP or npm audit

fuzzAgent.description: Executes fuzz testing to identify unexpected behaviors and vulnerabilities

voiceQAagent.description: Handles voice-based QA interaction using ElevenLabs

mistralBugReasoningAgent.description: Analyzes bugs with MISTRAL LLM and provides reasoning + fix suggestions

aggregatorAgent.description: Aggregates results from all QA agents into a unified report
